name: World's Largest Lakes
description: This deck contains flashcards about the world's largest lakes by surface area.

flashcards.question: What is the largest lake in the world by surface area?
Which lake is the largest freshwater lake in the world by surface area?
Which lake is the second largest in North America?
What is Africa's largest lake?
Which lake is shared by Peru and Bolivia?
Which lake is the deepest in the United States?
Which lake is the world's highest navigable lake?
What is the largest lake in South America?
What is the largest lake in Central America?
Which lake in Russia is the deepest lake in the world?
What is the largest lake in Australia?
What is the largest lake entirely in Canada?
Which lake is the largest in the Middle East?
What is the largest lake in the British Isles?
Which lake is the largest in the Himalayas?
What is the largest lake in China?
What is the largest saltwater lake in the United States?
Which lake is the largest in the Balkans?
What is the largest lake in Japan?
Which lake is the largest in Sweden?
What is the largest lake in Iceland?
What is the largest lake in New Zealand?
What is the largest lake in Finland?
Which lake is the largest in the Alps?
What is the largest lake in the Andes?
